source.ad8dce36:
def display_missing(df):    
    for col in df.columns.tolist():          
        print('{} column missing values: {}'.format(col, df[col].isnull().sum()))
    print('\n')
    

display_missing(train_df)

source.13505fa4: ### Task Container Id --- Id code for the batch of questions or lectures. For example, a user might see three questions in a row before seeing the explanations for any of them. Those three would all share a task_container_id. Monotonically increasing for each user. Go to TOC
